attributes.action: keep carlsberg and xxxx in enterprise inn's - save local pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enterprise Inn's have announced that both Carlsberg draught and Castlemaine XXXX will be withdrawn from its supply list at the end of January next year.
In a letter to its 7750 licensees across the country, seen by The Publican, the company said the decision had been taken because“customers and retailers have moved away from these brands over the last few years.”
The letter received by pubs last week said Enterprise had conducted a review into its standard lagers, which shows the two beers were “no longer viable”.
The letter said: “As part of the review we have concluded it is no longer viable to offer Carlsberg Draught Lager and Castlemaine XXXX as the number of stockists and volumes have fallen to such a low level.”
My thoughts are with people like myself who rely on their regular customers, many of which are carlsberg and XXXX drinkers, of which will now go elsewhere where these brands are sold! In a very challenging market place with declining beer sales and pubs closing at a rate of around five a day, surely this is suicide to our establishments??

rejection.details: Your petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
